name: Syr Cadian, Knight Owl

rulings.text: Knightlifelink is the same as granting lifelink to each Knight you control, but much, much cooler.
Syr Cadian is a Knight, so knightlifelink applies to it.
If a Knight you control has lifelink, Syr Cadian won’t cause you to gain additional life.
For determining which ability you can activate, use an official source that tracks when sunrise and sunset are in your area.
If it’s the exact minute of sunrise or sunset, you may activate both abilities. But hurry!

text:
Knightlifelink (Damage dealt by Knights you control also causes you to gain that much life.)
{W}: Syr Cadian, Knight Owl gains vigilance until end of turn. Activate only from sunrise to sunset.
{B}: Syr Cadian, Knight Owl gains flying until end of turn. Activate only from sunset to sunrise.
